data.comment: Graeme Shinnie (Derby County) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The away team replace Duane Holmes with Tom Lawrence.
In the minute 55, Henrik Dalsgaard (Brentford) has received a yellow card from David Webb.
Kornell Mark Marshall Winston McDonald is replacing Curtis Davies for the away team.
Mathias Jensen is on a sub for Emiliano Marcondes for Brentford.
In the minute 74, Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a second substitution, with Tarique Fosu replacing Bryan Mbeumo.
Brentford make their third substitution with Marcus Forss replacing Sergi Canos.
The home team have replaced Vitaly Janelt with Saman Ghoddos. This is the fourth substitution made today by Thomas Frank.
In the minute 86, Martyn Waghorn is on a sub for Kazim for Derby County.
The match has come to a close in London. The final score is 0-0.
Brentford's Joshua Da Silva has been booked in London.
Derby County make their fourth substitution with Morgan Whittaker replacing Kamil Jozwiak.
